comments.body: Do you think we should verify impersonated groups too?

Yeah, I think thats a good idea! I extended the tests to also check the groups.
However, as you can see some (seemingly) unrelated tests are failing now.  I ran the tests twice and both times the tests that are failing are different, while `Advanced Audit should audit API calls ` passes both times.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +110,114 @@		sort.Strings(e.ImpersonatedUser.Groups)
		event.ImpersonatedGroups = strings.Join(e.ImpersonatedUser.Groups, ",")
	}
	event.AuthorizeDecision = e.Annotations["authorization.k8s.io/decision"]
	return event, nil

comments.body: Hmm, this is going to be flaky if there is more than 1 group. I think you should just sort the groups before the join.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +109,113 @@		event.ImpersonatedUser = e.ImpersonatedUser.Username
		sort.Strings(e.ImpersonatedUser.Groups)
		event.ImpersonatedGroups = strings.Join(e.ImpersonatedUser.Groups, ",")
	}
	event.AuthorizeDecision = e.Annotations["authorization.k8s.io/decision"]
